Pressing the volume keys will wake your device
Kill the foreground app by long-pressing the back key
Double tap navigation bar to put the device to sleep
Double-tap on the status bar or top third and bottom shortcut area of the lock screen to turn off the display
Press on color below to apply
When unlocked, include options in the power menu for rebooting into recovery, bootloader or performing a soft reboot
When unlocked, include options in the power menu for rebooting into recovery, bootloader or performing a soft reboot
Bug reporting is disabled in development settings
Reset all dimensions entries to default?
Place the navigation bar on the left side of the screen in landscape mode
Edit and rearrange navigation bar buttons

To get started tap the edit icon to unlock the navigation bar for editing.

You can tap an icon to change its shortcut, or long press an icon to re-arrange the layout.

Tap save to commit your changes, or restore to reset the layout to default settings.
Delete current settings and restore the default layout?
Time that the screen stays on for notification pulse
Doze pulse will be triggered by pick up gesture sensor events
Pick up gesture sensor will not be utilized as a triggering mechanism
Doze pulse will be triggered by significant motion sensor events
Significant motion sensor will not be utilized as a triggering mechanism
Doze pulse will be triggered by notifications
Notifications will not be utilized as a trigger
Predefined doze repeat intervals (normally [1s,10s,30s,60s,120s]) will be used (default)
Doze will only pulse once per notification
Brightness level of doze pulse screen (% of max allowed brightness)

Include foreground task when clearing all
%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Show a brightness slider in the quick settings panel
Two main tiles on the first row
Three or four tiles on each row
Don\'t send touch events for navigation and status bar gestures to apps
To add a custom per-app configuration for expanded state, set "Enabled for all" to the off position
Choose a default expanded desktop style
Adjust brightness by sliding across the status bar
Enable orange status and navigation bars when battery saver is activated
Choose an icon for displaying the weather condition
Choose when the weather panel should be hidden
The weather panel will be hidden when the visible notifications will reach the maximum allowed notifications on the lock screen
The weather panel will be hidden when the visible notifications will reach the chosen number of notifications
The weather panel won\`t be hidden
Blurs and displays the content behind your lockscreen
Select where the weather temperature is shown on the statusbar
Scramble PIN layout when unlocking device
Show the weather in the status bar header
Display the number of pending notifications
Landscape keyboard will never take up entire screen
Force auto-rotate when keyboard is shown
Disables auto-rotate sensor %1$s seconds after keyboard is hidden
This feature forces auto-rotate to turn on temporarily while the keyboard is shown. It has no effect when auto-rotate is already enabled.
Force keyboard to show enter instead of emoticon key

Battery bar position and color customization
The charging animation may result in a poor user experience. Enable at your own discretion.
Dim navigation bar buttons after not interacting with navigation bar for a specified time
Time (in milliseconds) to wait before dimming buttons
Alpha value to dim buttons to
Duration (in milliseconds) of the alpha animation
Listen for touches on entire screen
Touching anywhere on the screen will cause buttons to un-dim
Only touches on the navbar will cause buttons to un-dim
Maximum entries size has been reached
It is not possible to delete last entry
Disabled\nAdd an entry to enable this feature
The chosen app did not return a valid icon or does not support image cropping. Use another app.
The chosen action cannot be added twice
, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the Reset icon.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.

, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the reset option.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.
Change the shortcuts on lockscreen to whatever you want
This will hide all force close notificaitons
Enable to show the date next to the clock in the status bar
Enabe to display the date small sized
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Ambient display notifications will not be inverted. Use for dark themes.
Ambient display notifications will show as inverted. Use for light/stock theme.
Select what notifications you want to breath in the status bar
Will give your sms notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar
Will give your missed call notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar
Will give your voicemail notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar
Display the app icon corresponding with the toast
This option will only disable the power menu on secure lock screens
Do not reduce media playback volume when a notification arrives
Disables transition animations such as when launching an app
Add, remove, and position items in the sidebar
Position the sidebar on the left or right side of the screen
Display a visible tab on the side which will display the sidebar when touched.

Multiple activities on screen at the same time.

WARNING: This is a highly experimental feature that allows multiple activities on-screen at the same time through the Recent apps UI. Some apps may crash or not function correctly when used with this feature.

Scrolling cache may improve scrolling performance at the cost of memory
Enable TCP/IP debugging over network interfaces (Wi-Fi, USB networks). This setting is reset on reboot

WARNING: When ADB over network is enabled, your phone is open for intrusions on all connected networks, including GSM data network!

Only use this feature when you are connected on trusted networks.

Volume keys control media volume rather than notifications
You don\'t have any blocked numbers. Add an entry by touching the Add (+) button.
To prevent phone numbers from calling or messaging you, enable the blocked caller list.
You will not receive incoming calls or messages from phone numbers on the blocked caller list
Don\'t block calls from private numbers
Don\'t block calls or messages from numbers not in the contact list
Block incoming %s from numbers not in the contact list
Use . as a wildcard and * for repetition. E.g. 123.* blocks numbers starting with 123 and .*123.* blocks numbers containing 123
Unable to add invalid phone number to blocked caller list
